title: India Has Central Role to Play Amid Challenges Around AI's Potential Misuse: Anthropic CEO
description: Anthropic Chief Executive Officer highlights India’s central role in tackling challenges around artificial intelligence misuse, stressing the need for responsible development and global cooperation.
content: India has a central role to play amid challenges around autonomous behaviour of AI models, their potential for being misused by individuals and governments, and for having the capability of economic displacement, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said on Th... [1678 chars]

title: AI Impact Summit: PM Modi gives MANAV vision, pitches ‘develop in India, develop for the world’
description: AI Summit 2026: Prime Minister Narendra Modi rolled out Indias MANAV Vision for AI -- a human-first doctrine that puts ethics, accountability and data sovereignty at the core of artificial intelligence. With a clear “design in India, develop for the world” message, Modi positioned India as both a tech powerhouse and a rule-setter in the AI age.

title: AI Revolution: India's Leading Role in Global Transformation
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasized the democratization of artificial intelligence for global inclusion at the India AI Impact Summit. With top global leaders present, Modi underscored India's pivotal role in the AI revolution, highlighting the country's tech-savvy youth and rapid adoption of technological advancements.
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi urged for the democratization of artificial intelligence, positioning it as a tool for inclusion at the India AI Impact Summit. The event, held in India, saw participation from global leaders and top executives, emphasizi... [542 chars]

title: Sundar Pichai Announces Google’s Full-Stack AI Hub In Vishakhapatnam As Part of $15 Billion India Investment, Calls AI 'The Biggest Platform Shift Of Lifetimes'
description: Sundar Pichai declared Google plans to build an all encompassing artificial intelligence center in Visakhapatnam which will form part of the company's $15 billion investment in India while he described artificial intelligence as the most significant technological advancement that people will experience throughout their entire lives. He explained that Vizag has developed into a worldwide artificial intelligence center which will create new employment opportunities and develop advanced digital systems to benefit both India and the rest of the world.

title: 'AI Will Wipe Out Existing Jobs': NCP SP Leader Rohit Pawar Urges Urgent Policy Action After Yoshua Bengio’s Remarks At Delhi Summit
description: NCP SP leader Rohit Pawar expressed concern over potential job losses due to artificial intelligence after AI pioneer Yoshua Bengio warned that governments are not doing enough to address employment disruption. Pawar urged the Centre and states to jointly prepare a concrete policy plan, stating that automation could eliminate existing jobs across sectors in the coming years.
content:
NCP SP leader Rohit Pawar on Thursday voiced serious concern over job losses due to artificial intelligence, reacting to remarks made by renowned AI pioneer Yoshua Bengio at the India AI Impact Summit 2026 in Delhi.
Pawar said that not only are new j... [1651 chars]

title: PM Modi presents India's MANAV AI vision, bats for ethical, inclusive use at mega summit
description: Speaking at the event, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that MANAV, the Hindi word for “human”, is an acronym that represents five core principles guiding India's approach to artificial intelligence.
content:
New Delhi:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said he was proud of India's role in shaping the artificial intelligence revolution, asserting that the country is setting a benchmark built on the principle of “happiness for all, welfare for all.”... [1033 chars]

title: Tech chiefs address India AI summit as Bill Gates cancels
description: NEW DELHI: Indian leader Narendra Modi and tech chiefs including OpenAI's Sam Altman will speak Thursday (Feb 19) on artificial intelligence's opportunities and threats at a summit in New Delhi, but Microsoft founder Bill Gates cancelled just hours before his speech.

title: Govt working to upskill, reskill IT workforce amid AI challenges: Vaishnaw
description: The government is aware of the challenges that the Indian IT industry is facing due to artificial intelligence and is working with academia to upskill and reskill talents, Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said on Thursday.
content:
The government is aware of the challenges that the Indian IT industry is facing due to artificial intelligence and is working with academia to upskill and reskill talents, Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said on Thursday.

title: A robotic dog made in China gets an Indian university kicked out of an AI summit
description: A private Indian university was booted from a top artificial intelligence summit in New Delhi on Wednesday after one of its staffers displayed a commercially available robotic dog made in China, claiming it was the university’s own innovation.
content: NEW DELHI — A private Indian university was booted from a top artificial intelligence summit in New Delhi on Wednesday after one of its staffers displayed a commercially available robotic dog made in China, claiming it was the university’s own innova... [2556 chars]

title: MAHE collaborates with OpenAI to integrate AI across teaching, learning, and research
description: Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE), an Institution of Eminence Deemed to be University, has partnered with OpenAI to integrate advanced artificial intelligence (AI) tools across teaching, research, and academic administration.
